nodes.text: The CP-2 Tactical Observation Probe was a model of small probe droid used by the Chiss spy Maki'voro, a lieutenant of the spymaster known as the Shroud during the Galactic War. It was one of a number of probe models that Maki'voro used.

CP-2 Tactical Observation Probes appear in the missions "Dark Design" and "All the Pieces," which are the Republic and Imperial versions of a mission in the macrobinoculars mission in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
